trans-unit.source: UMDF Verifier Properties for Driver Package Projects
trans-unit.target: UMDF Verifier Properties for Driver Package Projects

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties for the UMDF Verifier on a test computer.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties for the UMDF Verifier on a test computer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these settings when you build and deploy a driver to a test computer.
trans-unit.target: You can use these settings when you build and deploy a driver to a test computer.

trans-unit.source: For information about deployment, see [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909) and [Deploying a Driver to a Test Computer](deploying_a_driver_to_a_test_computer.md)
trans-unit.target: For information about deployment, see [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909) and [Deploying a Driver to a Test Computer](deploying_a_driver_to_a_test_computer.md)

trans-unit.source: For information about debugging UMDF drivers, see [How to Enable Debugging of a UMDF Driver](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff554716) and [WDF Verifier Control Application](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff556129).
trans-unit.target: For information about debugging UMDF drivers, see [How to Enable Debugging of a UMDF Driver](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff554716) and [WDF Verifier Control Application](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff556129).

trans-unit.source: Setting UMDF Verifier properties for driver projects
trans-unit.target: Setting UMDF Verifier properties for driver projects

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver package.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver package.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver package project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver package project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver package, click **Configuration Properties**, click **Driver Install**, and then click **UMDF Verifier**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver package, click **Configuration Properties**, click **Driver Install**, and then click **UMDF Verifier**.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Deploy UMDF Verifier** option.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Deploy UMDF Verifier** option.

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled (**Yes**), you can select the UMDF Verifier options to use on the test computer to verify a UMDF driver.
trans-unit.target: When this option is enabled (**Yes**), you can select the UMDF Verifier options to use on the test computer to verify a UMDF driver.

trans-unit.source: Option
trans-unit.target: Option

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Deploy UMDF Verifier
trans-unit.target: Deploy UMDF Verifier

trans-unit.source: Enables the UMDF verifier settings on the test computer.
trans-unit.target: Enables the UMDF verifier settings on the test computer.

trans-unit.source: UMDF Service Names
trans-unit.target: UMDF Service Names

trans-unit.source: Specifies the service names of the UMDF drivers to monitor.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the service names of the UMDF drivers to monitor.

trans-unit.source: Enable Object Tracking
trans-unit.target: Enable Object Tracking

trans-unit.source: Tracks all created UMDF objects.
trans-unit.target: Tracks all created UMDF objects.

trans-unit.source: Enable Reference Count Tracking
trans-unit.target: Enable Reference Count Tracking

trans-unit.source: Tracks all UMDF object references.
trans-unit.target: Tracks all UMDF object references.

trans-unit.source: Maximum Restart Attempts
trans-unit.target: Maximum Restart Attempts

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of times UMDF will restart a failed host process.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of times UMDF will restart a failed host process.

trans-unit.source: UMDF Logging level
trans-unit.target: UMDF Logging level

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount of information logged by the UMDF verifier for the drivers it is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the amount of information logged by the UMDF verifier for the drivers it is hosting.

trans-unit.source: Only Critical and Fatal Errors - Logs only critical and fatal errors.
trans-unit.target: Only Critical and Fatal Errors - Logs only critical and fatal errors.

trans-unit.source: All Errors - Logs all errors.
trans-unit.target: All Errors - Logs all errors.

trans-unit.source: Warnings and all Errors - Logs warnings and all errors.
trans-unit.target: Warnings and all Errors - Logs warnings and all errors.

trans-unit.source: Informational events, Warnings and all Errors - Logs informational events, warnings, and all errors.
trans-unit.target: Informational events, Warnings and all Errors - Logs informational events, warnings, and all errors.

trans-unit.source: Verbose Output (All Events of any Sort) - Logs all events.
trans-unit.target: Verbose Output (All Events of any Sort) - Logs all events.

trans-unit.source: Log to Kernel Debugger
trans-unit.target: Log to Kernel Debugger

trans-unit.source: Logs verifier output to the kernel debugger.
trans-unit.target: Logs verifier output to the kernel debugger.

trans-unit.source: Break into Kernel Debugger
trans-unit.target: Break into Kernel Debugger

trans-unit.source: Break into kernel debugger when the UMDF host process fails.
trans-unit.target: Break into kernel debugger when the UMDF host process fails.

trans-unit.source: Attach to Kernel Debugger
trans-unit.target: Attach to Kernel Debugger

trans-unit.source: Attaches to the kernel debugger if no user-mode debugger is attached.
trans-unit.target: Attaches to the kernel debugger if no user-mode debugger is attached.

trans-unit.source: Timeout on Driver Load (sec)
trans-unit.target: Timeout on Driver Load (sec)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before attaching the debugger after the driver loads.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before attaching the debugger after the driver loads.

trans-unit.source: Timeout on Driver Start (sec)
trans-unit.target: Timeout on Driver Start (sec)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before attaching the debugger after the driver starts.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before attaching the debugger after the driver starts.

trans-unit.source: Verify at Current Level
trans-unit.target: Verify at Current Level

trans-unit.source: Verifies drivers built using earlier versions of the framework against current framework versions rules.
trans-unit.target: Verifies drivers built using earlier versions of the framework against current framework versions rules.

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.target: User-Mode Driver Framework
